page.title: 07BEER TO BRANSCOMBE
page.content: Part of the coastal footpath can be walked from Beer to Branscombe.This walk begins by climbing westwards out of Beer passing the cliffs at Beer Head and then continuing along the top of the cliffs before descending into Branscombe,not the village,but the beach. As you journey ,along you pass a large landslip which is very impressive.This coast is renowned for landslips.Another can be seen to the east of Seaton. To make this walk more interesting you can walk back below the cliffs and get a different view. The area below the cliffs is sheltered and a haven for wildlife.
